title: Preparing Your Garden for the Growing Season

tasks.task: Preparing a garden for the growing season
subtasks: Determine if soil is ready for cultivation by checking moisture content
Remove plant debris from the soil surface
Interpret soil test results for fertilization needs
Add organic matter like compost or peat moss to improve soil
Till the garden soil to create a seedbed
Plan crop rotations and spacing for adequate growth
Use a garden journal to track progress and plan for future seasons
